casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Joseph D. Assuntino et al. Jerrold, H. Barnett, public defender, in support of the motion. Howard A. Jacobs, in support of the motion. Anthony J. Lasala, in support of the motion. Submitted January 3 decided February 2, 1978 Submitted January 10

decided February 2, 1978

Submitted January 13

decided February 2, 1978

The “Motion by Defendant-In-Error, Ronald Baia, for Addition to the Printed Record,” dated December 28, 1977, is granted by the court.

The “Motion by Defendants-In-Error, Joseph Assuntino, John Computaro, Felix Compo, Albert DiGrrazia, William Murphy, Jr., Anthony Longobardi and Nicholas Carrano, for Addition to the Printed Record,” dated January 6, 1978, is granted by the court.

The “Motion by Defendant-In-Error, Edward Compo, for Addition to the Printed Record,” dated January 11, 1978, is granted by the court.
